snippet.title: The Last Starship
snippet.description:
Wishlist our new game on Steam and join the Playtest:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1857080/The_Last_Starship/

Mark & Chris present to you the broken, unfinished and bug filled prototype of our new game - The Last Starship. Choose a spaceship hull, equip her with engines, life-support, sensors and rail guns and start your galactic adventure...

ART CREDITS
- Thanks and credit to Adam Riches for the crew member character sprite - thanks for being so understanding with us!  
https://twitter.com/Supernorn

- Thanks to Amber Mechanic for the gorgeous pixel galaxy backdrop https://twitter.com/AmberMechanic

- Thanks to FTL for the shuttle graphics - and thanks to Matthew & Justin at Subset Games for creating FTL in the first place
https://twitter.com/subsetgames
